title: Grim Tales - Hosted by Rik Mayall
description:
Grim Tales is a British children's television program based on fairy tales by the Brothers Grimm, featuring Rik Mayall as the storyteller dressed in his pyjamas and dressing gown. The twenty-two episodes were broadcast on ITV from 1989 to 1991,The series is rated TV-14 the released on video cassette.

As it was never aired on DVD these episodes were ripped from VHS.

Cheers and Please help others by seeding.
